rooms.description: An open space with a wheelchair-accessible ramp and tactile floor indicators. Minimalist design with subtle earth tones.
Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on one side for natural light. Features integrated minimalist decor and low-profile furniture to ensure wheelchair accessibility.
Adjacent to the living room. Minimalist dining table with open space design for easy navigation.
Functional minimalist kitchen designed for ease of use and wheelchair accessibility. Counters at adjustable heights with ample storage beneath.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom featuring low threshold entry, grab bars, and a minimalist design.
A dedicated storage area for household utilities ensuring clutter-free spaces in the home.

openings.features: Ramped entry with a tactile guide path. Large sliding glass door providing ease of access and enhanced natural lighting.
Spacious balcony attached to the living room, featuring minimalistic railings and floor-to-ceiling windows for open views.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony. Floor-to-ceiling windows offer expansive views and natural light. Designed with wheelchair-accessible furniture layout.
Secondary bedroom with an adjoining spacious balcony for relaxation. Minimalist design incorporating floor-to-ceiling windows and accessible storage.
Functional bedroom featuring a private balcony. Layout designed to be wheelchair accessible with minimal obstructions.
A shared balcony area linking all the bedrooms on the first floor for continuity and additional outdoor space. Features railing design consistent with Vastu principles.
Accessible bathroom in each bedroom ensuring privacy and ease of access with low thresholds and grab bars.

openings.features: Spacious balcony offering privacy, designed for wheelchair accessibility with smooth transitions from interior to exterior.
Open balcony area integrated into the design, ensuring ample natural light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.
